segments.text: Here you are . seventy-five cent , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And please sent this letter by registered mail .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there anything valuable in it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There ’ s a check of two hundred dollars and photograph .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Shall I make out a receipt ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ‘ ll be ninety-five cents in all .
segments.speaker: S2
